channel.title: Android Studio on Leonidas Simopoulos's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Android Studio on Leonidas Simopoulos's blog

item.title: Android: Client not ready yet
item.description: I started developing an android app on my surface but then I decided to move the code to my stationary pc. I copied the whole source on a USB stick and pasted it on the other pc. I started the Android Studio and got an error dialog that it was warning me that the android sdk root path(that it was declared on the project) is not valid and I was propmpted to verify so the Android Studio points to the actual and correct path.
